name: LevelLoop (Ludum Dare 47)
description:
LevelLoop is a game where you play Level 1, then Level 1 again, then again, and again, and again, until the game ends after 8 times, but each time you complete the level, it gets harder, and harder. At the end of each "stage", there's a boss, and that gets harder and harder.

This game controls are simple,
left and right to move,
space to do your jump actions,
and the mouse for your gun (If you find it).

Hope you enjoy the game!
